Package fr.internetcartographier.util.cache

Class CacheMinDistances

java.lang.Object
fr.internetcartographier.util.cache.CacheMinimumDistances
public class CacheMinDistances extends Object
A cache for storing and retrieving minimum distances between nodes in an Internet graph. The cache is used to store minimum paths computed using various weight metrics and geolocation services.

    • containsNode

      public boolean containsNode(String node)
      Constructs a new CacheMinDistances instance by copying the content of another instance.
      Parameters:
      cacheMinDistance - Another CacheMinDistances instance to copy.

    • addNode

      public void addNode(String node)
      Checks if the cache contains information for the specified node.
      Parameters:
      node - The IP address of the node.

    • removeNode

      public void removeNode(String node)
      Removes a node and its associated information from the cache.
      Parameters:
      node - The IP address of the node to remove.

    • resetCache

      public void resetCache()
      Resets the entire cache, removing all nodes and their associated information.

    • resetCacheMetricDistance

      public void resetCacheMetricDistance()
      Resets the cache for a specific weight metric, removing all stored paths.

    • updateCache

      public void updateCache(WeightMetric weightMetric, String geolocationService, Path<String> path)
      Updates the cache with a new minimum path for a specific weight metric and geolocation service. Add the reversed path to the node of destination too.
      Parameters:
      weightMetric - The weight metric used in the path calculation.
      geolocationService - The geolocation service used in the path calculation.
      path - The minimum path to update the cache with.

    • getMinPath

      public Optional<Path<String>> getMinPath(WeightMetric weightMetric, String geolocationService, String source, String destination)
      Retrieves the minimum path for a specific weight metric and geolocation service between two nodes.
      Parameters:
      weightMetric - The weight metric used in the path calculation.
      geolocationService - The geolocation service used in the path calculation.
      source - The source node's IP address.
      destination - The destination node's IP address.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the minimum path if found, or empty if not.
